changelog: New advanced versioning system with alpha/beta/release cycle
Comprehensive update system with in-place upgrades and downgrades
Advanced update CLI with check, upgrade, downgrade, and rollback commands
Automatic database schema migration during updates
Update system integrated with clustering for coordinated updates
Complete rollback capabilities with backup restoration
Dedicated security update detection and prioritization
breaking_changes: New versioning scheme breaks compatibility with old version parsing
Legacy update API replaced with new system
security_updates: Secure rollback process with integrity checks
